Docs.remarks:
Contains classes to explore data returned through a content provider.
If you need to manage data in a private database, use the classes. These classes are used to manage the object returned from a content provider query. Databases are usually created and opened with To make requests through content providers, you can use the class.
All databases are stored on the device in /data/data/<package_name>/databases
